dublin_core.dcvalue: In this narrative review we will present a brief overview of known disparities in children s language development based on socioeconomic status SES and efforts in the primary care setting to promote children s language development Next we will define mobile health m health and review the limited published literature regarding the effectiveness of m health interventions in promoting children s health in general and language development in particular Finally we will discuss the potential role of smart phone applications to increase parental behaviors that promote their children s language development as well as challenges that should be addressed as the field of m health continues to grow
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-08T14:18:05Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2-11-30
Using Mobile Health to Promote Early Language Development: A Narrative Review.
